mixed$fill
A value used to fill missing items
Renvoie

twig_array_column() twig_array_columnCoreExtension.php CoreExtension.phptwig_array_column
twig_array_column ( $array, $name, $index = null )
Returns the values from a single column in the input array.
{% set items = [{ 'fruit' : 'apple'}, {'fruit' : 'orange' }] %}
{% set fruits = items|column('fruit') %}
{# fruits now contains ['apple', 'orange'] #}
Paramètres
array | Traversable$array
An array
mixed$name
The column name
mixed$index
The column to use as the index/keys for the returned array
Renvoie
array The array of values
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :

twig_array_merge() twig_array_mergeCoreExtension.php CoreExtension.phptwig_array_merge
twig_array_merge ( $arrays)
Merges any number of arrays or Traversable objects.
{% set items = { 'apple': 'fruit', 'orange': 'fruit' } %}
{% set items = items|merge({ 'peugeot': 'car' }, { 'banana': 'fruit' }) %}
{# items now contains { 'apple': 'fruit', 'orange': 'fruit', 'peugeot': 'car', 'banana': 'fruit' } #}
Paramètres
array|
Traversable ...$arrays Any number of arrays or Traversable objects to merge
Renvoie
array The merged array
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :

section.section:
twig_date_converter() twig_date_converterCoreExtension.php CoreExtension.phptwig_date_converter
twig_date_converter (Environment $env, $date = null , $timezone = null )
Converts an input to a \DateTime instance.
{% if date(user.created_at) < date('+2days') %} {# do something #} {% endif %}
Paramètres
\DateTimeInterface | string | null$date
A date or null to use the current time
\DateTimeZone | string | false | null$timezone
The target timezone, null to use the default, false to leave unchanged
Renvoie
\DateTimeInterface
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :

twig_date_format_filter() twig_date_format_filterCoreExtension.php CoreExtension.phptwig_date_format_filter
twig_date_format_filter (Environment $env, $date, $format = null , $timezone = null )
Converts a date to the given format.
{{ post.published_at|date("m/d/Y") }}
Paramètres
\DateTimeInterface | \DateInterval | string$date
A date
string | null$format
The target format, null to use the default
\DateTimeZone | string | false | null$timezone
The target timezone, null to use the default, false to leave unchanged
Renvoie
string The formatted date
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :

twig_date_modify_filter() twig_date_modify_filterCoreExtension.php CoreExtension.phptwig_date_modify_filter
twig_date_modify_filter (Environment $env, $date, $modifier)
Returns a new date object modified.
{{ post.published_at|date_modify("-1day")|date("m/d/Y") }}
Paramètres
\DateTimeInterface | string$date
A date
string$modifier
A modifier string
Renvoie
\DateTimeInterface
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :

twig_get_array_keys_filter() twig_get_array_keys_filterCoreExtension.php CoreExtension.phptwig_get_array_keys_filter
twig_get_array_keys_filter ( $array)
Returns the keys for the given array.
It is useful when you want to iterate over the keys of an array:
{% for key in array|keys %} {# ... #} {% endfor %}
Paramètres
array$array
An array
Renvoie
array The keys
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :

twig_get_attribute() twig_get_attributeCoreExtension.php CoreExtension.phptwig_get_attribute
twig_get_attribute (Environment $env, Source $source, $object, $item, array $arguments = [] , $type = 'any' , $isDefinedTest = false , $ignoreStrictCheck = false , $sandboxed = false , int $lineno = -1 )
Returns the attribute value for a given array/object.
Paramètres
mixed$object
The object or array from where to get the item
mixed$item
The item to get from the array or object
array$arguments
An array of arguments to pass if the item is an object method
string$type
The type of attribute (
Voir également
\Twig\Template constants)
Paramètres
bool$isDefinedTest
Whether this is only a defined check
bool$ignoreStrictCheck
Whether to ignore the strict attribute check or not
int$lineno
The template line where the attribute was called
Renvoie
mixed The attribute value, or a Boolean when $isDefinedTest is true, or null when the attribute is not set and $ignoreStrictCheck is true
Exceptions
RuntimeError
if the attribute does not exist and Twig is running in strict mode and $isDefinedTest is false
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :

The template to render or an array of templates to try consecutively

twig_join_filter() twig_join_filterCoreExtension.php CoreExtension.phptwig_join_filter
twig_join_filter ( $value, $glue = '' , $and = null )
Joins the values to a string.
The separators between elements are empty strings per default, you can define them with the optional parameters.
{{ [1, 2, 3]|join(', ', ' and ') }} {# returns 1, 2 and 3 #}
{{ [1, 2, 3]|join('|') }} {# returns 1|2|3 #}
{{ [1, 2, 3]|join }} {# returns 123 #}
Paramètres
array$value
An array
string$glue
The separator
string | null$and
The separator for the last pair
Renvoie
string The concatenated string
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :

section.title: twig_nl2br()
section.para: Inserts HTML line breaks before all newlines in a string.

section.section:
twig_number_format_filter() twig_number_format_filterCoreExtension.php CoreExtension.phptwig_number_format_filter
twig_number_format_filter (Environment $env, $number, $decimal = null , $decimalPoint = null , $thousandSep = null )
Number format filter.
All of the formatting options can be left null, in that case the defaults will be used. Supplying any of the parameters will override the defaults set in the environment object.
Paramètres
mixed$number
A float/int/string of the number to format
int$decimal
the number of decimal points to display
string$decimalPoint
the character(s) to use for the decimal point
string$thousandSep
the character(s) to use for the thousands separator
Renvoie
string The formatted number
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :

twig_random() twig_randomCoreExtension.php CoreExtension.phptwig_random
twig_random (Environment $env, $values = null , $max = null )
Returns a random value depending on the supplied parameter type:
a random item from a \Traversable or array
a random character from a string
a random integer between 0 and the integer parameter.
Paramètres
\Traversable | array | int | float | string$values
The values to pick a random item from
int | null$max
Maximum value used when $values is an int
Renvoie
mixed A random value from the given sequence
Exceptions
RuntimeError
when $values is an empty array (does not apply to an empty string which is returned as is)
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :

twig_split_filter() twig_split_filterCoreExtension.php CoreExtension.phptwig_split_filter
twig_split_filter (Environment $env, $value, $delimiter, $limit = null )
Splits the string into an array.
{{ "one,two,three"|split(',') }} {# returns [one, two, three] #}
{{ "one,two,three,four,five"|split(',', 3) }} {# returns [one, two, "three,four,five"] #}
{{ "123"|split('') }} {# returns [1, 2, 3] #}
{{ "aabbcc"|split('', 2) }} {# returns [aa, bb, cc] #}
Paramètres
string | null$value
A string
string$delimiter
The delimiter
int$limit
The limit
Renvoie
array The split string as an array
Voici le graphe d'appel pour cette fonction :

...$values
Renvoie
string

section.para: Strips HTML and PHP tags from a string.

section.section:
twig_test_empty() twig_test_emptyCoreExtension.php CoreExtension.phptwig_test_empty
twig_test_empty ( $value)
Checks if a variable is empty.
{# evaluates to true if the foo variable is null, false, or the empty string #} {% if foo is empty %} {# ... #} {% endif %}
Paramètres
mixed$value
A variable
Renvoie
bool true if the value is empty, false otherwise
Voici le graphe des appelants de cette fonction :

section.title: twig_test_iterable()
section.para: Checks if a variable is traversable.
{# evaluates to true if the foo variable is an array or a traversable object #} {% if foo is iterable %} {# ... #} {% endif %}

formalpara.title: Renvoie
formalpara.para: bool true if the value is traversable

para.para: since Twig 3.8, to be removed in 4.0 (use the native "is_iterable" function instead)
